name: @ngpakistan/smart-ui
description: Simple UI Components created for the Angular Pakistan Components Workshop

scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run watch:src" "npm run start:demo"
scripts.build: rimraf dist && ngc && npm run build:copyresource
scripts.build:es5: rimraf dist && ngc -p tsconfig.es5.json && npm run build:fesmes5 && npm run build:copyresource
scripts.build:es2015: rimraf dist && ngc -p tsconfig.es2015.json && npm run build:fesm2015 && npm run build:copyresource
scripts.build:fesmes5: rollup dist/smart-ui.es5.js -o dist/bundle/smart-ui.es5.js -f umd -n smart-ui && npm run build:postrollup
scripts.build:fesm2015: rollup dist/smart-ui.es2015.js -o dist/bundle/smart-ui.es2015.js -f umd -n smart-ui.es2015 && npm run build:postrollup
scripts.link:lib: cd dist && npm link && rimraf node_modules && cd .. && cd demo && npm link @ngpakistan/smart-ui
scripts.npm:publish: npm run build && npm publish dist --access public --tag beta

author: Obaid
